room_title: Escape room "Escape Mars" by Escape Mars in Denver
room_description:
The first astronauts living on Mars have discovered something incredible, an alien tomb millions of years old. But before long their reports grew strange, disoriented. They exhibited signs of a mental collapse. Then vanished...
Your crew is being sent to investigate the alien tomb and discover the fate of the lost scientists. Can you solve the mystery and escape the camp before the Martian dust storm arrives, burying the site beneath the red sands forever?
